description:
A whisper-quiet lifestyle on the outskirts of the Perth hills awaits you here from within the walls of this charming 4 bedroom 1 bathroom home that leaves plenty of scope for you to add your own personal modern touches throughout.

A secure gated entrance into the property reveals a lovely front verandah, a private pitched patio-entertaining area that is fully enclosed and protected from the elements and an adjoining lock-up remote-controlled double carport – with access to a lockable powered workshop that also leads to the backyard.

Inside, a carpeted front lounge and formal-dining room is spacious enough to cater for the entire family, playing host to a ceiling fan and both manual and electric security roller shutters at the same time. Low-maintenance flooring graces an open-plan kitchen and meals area, alongside reverse-cycle air-conditioning, electric roller shutters, a breakfast bar for quick bites, a storage pantry, a stainless-steel range hood, an electric hotplate, a Chef oven/grill, double sinks and a wooden storage pantry.

A gorgeous French door off here reveals a tiled and enclosed sunroom – or games room – with French/security-door access to both the side garden and a rear patio in different directions. The latter overlooks a sunken backyard area that is somewhat of a “blank canvas” and can be whatever you want it to be. It also features a large garden shed and gated access from the lovely nature reserve next door.

The bedrooms are all carpeted for comfort and the practical bathroom caters for everybody's personal needs in the form of a shower and separate bathtub. Out on the front lawn, there is potential for an extra pitched single carport – or somewhere to just sit and relax under cover, without a worry in the world.

Despite living on the edge of the Darling Scarp, you will fully appreciate this property's very close proximity to the Darling Ridge Shopping Centre, medical facilities, the Swan View Tavern, a plethora of picturesque local parklands, Swan View Primary School and Swan View Senior High School – all of which are only walking distance away. Don't forget about the stunning John Forrest National Park, the heart of Midland and major arterial roads for easy access to the city, Perth Airport and our picturesque Swan Valley. Nothing is too far from your front doorstep here, despite the obvious seclusion!


Other features include, but are not limited to;

Two built-in double wardrobes to the larger master bedroom
Spacious 2nd bedroom with built-in double robes of its own
3rd bedroom with a ceiling fan and manual security roller shutter to its window
Separate 4th bedroom
Storage cupboard in the laundry
Back-patio access, from the laundry
Separate toilet
Lock-up internal storeroom
Two double hallway linen cupboards
Solar-power panels
Security-alarm system
Feature ceiling cornices
Skirting boards
Solar hot-water system
696sqm (approx.) block

For more information, please contact Kelly Jones on 0413 147 393.
